page.title: 16SETTLEMENT
page.content: {All figures from 1982 parish estimates The area is two parishes, St. Blaise and Tywardreath. St. Blaise has a population of 5235 and Tywardreath, 3200. Carlyon Bay has a population of 1145, St. Blazey gate and Biscovey 2035, and Par 3200. Tregrehan only has a population of about 100. Most people live in Carlyon Bay and St. Blazey. In Carlyon Bay, the buildings are large and clean, with large gardens. To the North there are a great number of trees. Carlyon Bay is a leisure centre and has the Cornish Leisure World centre and a golf course nearby. Par is an area of small, but smart houses, based around a simple road system. There are large docks to the South and claytips to the East
